courses.name: Makers Academy
courses.location: Makers Academy, Commercial Street, City of London, United Kingdom
courses.description: Makers Academy is Europe's leading Web Developer bootcamp. With our help, you'll learn the principles of software craftsmanship and we'll also help you get your first job. We've graduated over 700 students into their dream jobs as junior developers.

courses.name: Front-End Web Developer Nanodegree
courses.description: Master the skills required to become a Front-End Web Developer, and start building beautiful, responsive websites optimized for mobile and desktop performance. Learn the fundamentals of how the web works and gain a working knowledge of the three foundational languages that power each and every website: HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
